name: Ghostwood
description:
A short student project I made at Kymenlaakson Opisto, where I had the opportunity to explore my creativity and develop my skills in Game Design. The project was challenging but rewarding, and I'm proud of the result, but does contain some jank!

short, 10-15 minutes of gameplay.

-INTRO-
What a fridgid night, I can't help but shiver. The wind is howling and the strange constellation overhead seems to be mocking me with its eerie glow. I need to find a warm place to take shelter, and fast, before I freeze to death out here. I set off down the road, my eyes peeled for any sign of a fireplace or shelter. But I know I'm not alone out here; I can hear the distant growls of a monster lurking in the darkness. I'll have to be careful!"

-Controls-
WASD to Move and Mouse to look
Left Mouse Click to Shoot
E To Interact
R to Reload (after both chambers are discharged)
Space to Jump
Hold Shift to Run
ESC To Quit

"Please be advised that Audio volume might be a bit loud!!, no ingame settings"
